T02D2391:21b-1: aa nu yo ga ta tva bh'a ba no pa de sha n'a ma /
T02D2391:21b-3: de nyid bde ba bsgom pa'i rjes su 'brang pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba /
T02D2391:21b-4: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2391:21b-5: gang zhig snying gar kha sbyor padma'i dbus su ni //
T02D2391:21b-6: sems nyid phra zhing rab gsal khyab la nyams dang ldan //
T02D2391:21b-7: khams gsum thams cad nye bar gnyis med thob 'gyur ba //
T02D2391:21b-8: mnyam zhing gnyis med chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2391:21b-9: g-yo 'gyur dbang po'i rta rgod nang du thim pa de //
T02D2391:21b-10: rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes yang dag snod du ni ;
T02D2391:21b-11: / mkhas pas gnyis med thob 'gyur myur ma'i don rtogs pas //
T02D2391:21b-12: dpal ldan dri med nam mkha' ltar ni lta ba grub //
T02D2391:21b-13: sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni //
T02D2391:21b-14: chos dang chos nyid bsgoms pas chos sku'i rang bzhin thob //
T02D2391:22a-0: de nyid dran tshor rig pa med 'gyur @22a * //
T02D2391:22a-2: shin tu bsgoms pa'i dgos pa 'od gsal yid gnyis med //
T02D2391:22a-3: yi ge med pa'i theg le snying gar gnas pa ni //
T02D2391:22a-4: sgom par byed pa'i rnal 'byor ye shes rab tu skye //
T02D2391:22a-5: de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro snying rjer ldan pa thams cad gnas //
T02D2391:22a-6: sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' khams su bcas //
T02D2391:22a-7: de nyid rang bzhin mchod pas mchod 'os rnams las mchod pa thob //
T02D2391:22a-8: gang zhig rnal 'byor sgom byed sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod //
T02D2391:22a-9: mchod sgom byed pa de ni 'bras bu sangs rgyas gsung //
T02D2391:22a-10: rdo rje rnal 'byor nang gi bdag nyid gnyis sbyor bas //
T02D2391:22a-11: de phyir rdo rje'i mchod pas mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod //
T02D2391:22a-12: ye shes lnga 'phros sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med //
T02D2391:22a-13: gang zhig rnal 'byor lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la //
T02D2391:22a-14: bandu ka yi 'bras ltar bad drug ge sar dbus //
T02D2391:22a-15: aa ni su tri pre du ka rigs drug 'gag phyir bsgom //
T02D2391:22a-16: dbus su khong stong yig 'bru drug po rim gyis ni //
T02D2391:22a-17: ka la thim pas sems nyid 'gags te skye ba med //
T02D2391:22a-18: bsgrib bya sgrib byed rang sems dri med dmigs pa med //
T02D2391:22a-19: rgyud rnams 'dul phyir gsungs te rnal 'byor don dam min //
T02D2391:22a-20: sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub 'gyur rang bzhin mchod pa che //
T02D2391:22a-21: gnas chen nyi shu rang gnas sa lam rim pa thob //
T02D2391:22a-22: de phyir de nyid gzhan du mi tshol rang la gnas //
T02D2391:22a-23: rnal 'byor de nyid ma rtogs 'khyams na ci zhig bya //
T02D2391:22a-24: gal te de nyid rtogs na gzhan du ci zhig bya //
T02D2391:22a-25: skal bzang bdag nyid rang la grub cing de nyid thob //
T02D2391:22a-26: gang zhig gang gi sbyor bas brtul zhugs can gyis ni //
T02D2391:22a-27: gnyis med bsam gtan la ni smon pa bzhin du spyod //
T02D2391:22a-28: nam mkha'i gos can yang na rnal 'byor de min pa //
T02D2391:22a-29: lus la yi dam lha gnas rang bzhin de nyid bsgom //
T02D2391:22a-30: zla ba drug tu ngag bsdams mkha' 'gro rnams dang phrad //
T02D2391:22a-31: ye shes 'od 'phros rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam //
T02D2391:22a-32: sgyu ma mkhan ltar 'dul mchog 'gro ba'i don mdzad do //
T02D2391:22a-33: de nyid bde bsgom pa'i rjes su 'brang pa'i rnal
T02D2391:22a-34: 'byor bsgom pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba slob dpon
